title: Case 1
description: Law of the Council of Ministers on the normal maintenance of employees in central government institutions of the civil department; expense accounts for the Office of the General Secretariat of the Ukrainian Central Rada, lists for payment of maintenance to employees of the General Secretariat of Jewish Affairs, statements of employees of the Ministry of Jewish Affairs on the provision of monetary assistance, 11/10/1917-08/1918, 32 sheets.

title: Case 2
description: Correspondence of the Secretariat of Internal Affairs with the provincial and district commissioners on the appointment of the General Secretary of Jewish Affairs, the prevention of pogroms and the issuing of money to persons injured in the pogroms, 10.10.1917-02.09.1918, 12 sheets.

title: Case 3
description: Circular of the Council of People's Ministers on the procedure for introducing draft laws on record keeping; correspondence with the Council of People's Ministers and ministries about sending their draft laws, sending representatives to meetings of the state approval commission, etc., 11/14/1917-06/07/1918, 52 sheets.

title: Case 4
description: Telegrams and a report of the Ministry of Jewish Affairs on the formation of national-personal autonomy, the preparation of elections to the Ukrainian Constituent Assembly and the abolition of restrictions for the Jewish colonists of Kherson region and Katerynoslav region; certificates, etc., 02.01.1918-07.08.1918, 43 sheets.

title: Case 5
description: Minutes of meetings of the commission of the General Secretariat of Jewish Affairs and correspondence with the General Secretariat of Military Affairs on the conscription of Jews into the army, lists of Jewish officers, 07.11.1917-02.07.1918, 21 sheets.

title: Case 6
description: Minutes of meetings of managers of farms and garages and acts of a special commission for inspection of apartments of the Ministry of Jewish Affairs, correspondence with the economic department of the Council of Ministers on sending information on the number of cars and property, etc. , 19.12.1917-06.08.1918, 56 sheets.

title: Case 7
description: Orders of the Ministry of Jewish Affairs on employment, acts of property assessment; correspondence with the Ministry of Finance, State Control, the Commission for the Liquidation of National Ministries, transfer of funds, handover of seals, transfer of property; descriptions of documents of the Ministry of Jewish Affairs, 02.08.1918-06.09.1918, 79 sheets.

title: Case 8
description: Protests of Jewish public councils against the abolition of national personal autonomy and national ministries. Information on the results of elections to Jewish communities, 04.08.1918-26.08.1918, 28 sheets.

title: Case 9
description: Correspondence with the Council of People's Ministers of the Ukrainian People's Republic, the Council of Ministers of the UD, the Ministry of Military Affairs, etc. about printing circulars, opening loans, purchasing furniture, etc. Addresses of the heads of the Ministry of Jewish Affairs, November 27, 1917-August 6, 1918, 54 sheets.

title: Case 10
description: Correspondence with the Ministry of Finance and State Control about the allocation of funds for the maintenance of employees of the Ministry in Jewish affairs, the opening of libraries, etc., 10/16/1917-08/07/1918, 48 sheets.

title: Case 11
description: Correspondence with the Ministry of Finance, the Ministry of Land Affairs, the Ministry of Communications, etc. on the transfer of security department files to the Central Archives of the Ministry of Jewish Affairs and the issuance of railway tickets for employees, 11/13/1917-07/11/1918, 62 sheets.

title: Case 12
description: Applications for employment at the Ministry of Jewish Affairs, November 30, 1917-July 5, 1918, 69 sheets.

title: Case 13
description: Statements by employees of the Ministry of Jewish Affairs regarding the granting of vacations, issuance of certificates, etc., 12/20/1917-06/10/1918, 38 sheets.

title: Case 14
description: Certificates of employees of the Ministry of Jewish Affairs, October 29, 1917-July 23, 1918, 80 sheets.

title: Case 15
description: Copies of certificates of employees of the Ministry of Jewish Affairs, 02.01.1918-10.07.1918, 230 sheets.

title: Case 16
description: Form lists of employees of the Ministry of Jewish Affairs, 1917-07/18/1918, 93 sheets.

title: Case 17
description: Provisions on the Jewish National Union and its statute, theses to the draft law on local bodies of the Jewish National Union in Ukraine, the Law of the Ukrainian People's Republic on National-Personal Autonomy, report note, etc. (drafts), 74 sheets.

title: Case 18
description: Resolution of the Congress of Representatives of the Jewish Community of the Proskuriv District on the Elections to the Constituent Assembly and the All-Russian Jewish Congress, pogroms, etc., a draft of the draft law on Jewish public self-government, a copy of the rules for drawing up temporary expense lists for January-April 1919, 10.10.1918- 11.10.1918, 22 sheets.

title: Case 19
description: Copy of the Volyn provincial commissar's circular, correspondence with city authorities and information from the Volyn provincial board on the issuance of sums from the "box" collection, 18.01.1918-26.08.1918, 13 sheets.

title: Case 20
description: Circulars of the General Secretariat for Jewish Affairs, correspondence with the election commissions for elections to Jewish public councils and with the city administrations of the Kyiv province on conducting elections and accepting the records of the commissions, 25.10.1917-29.07.1918, 219 sheets.

title: Case 21
description: Circular of the General Secretariat for Jewish Affairs on the procedure for establishing the fact of birth or death of citizens of Jewish nationality, information about which is missing in the metric books and correspondence with the city administrations of the Kyiv province on this issue, 10/25/1917-07/17/1918, 31 sheets.

title: Case 22
description: Circular of the General Secretariat for Jewish Affairs on conducting rabbi elections; correspondence with city councils, district commissioners and elders of Kyiv region about elections to Jewish communities and transfer of excess "box" collection to election commissions for elections to Jewish communities, 25.10.1917-28.07.1918, 22 sheets.

title: Case 23
description: Correspondence on the creation of election commissions for Jewish public councils, minutes of meetings of election commissions and Jewish city and parish administrations of the Kyiv province on the organization of elections, cost estimates and reports on the progress of elections, 08.12.1917-18.07.1918, 145 sheets.

title: Case 24
description: Circulars of the Ministry of Jewish Affairs (copies), correspondence with city councils and election commissions for Jewish communities in cities of the Poltava province on conducting elections and sending commission records, 12/22/1917-07/18/1918, 35 sheets.

title: Case 25
description: Correspondence of the Department of National Self-Government on elections to the Kharkiv Council of the Jewish Community, 07/01/1918, 2 sheets.

title: Case 26
description: Correspondence of the Department of National Self-Government on receiving monetary reports, 07/15/1918, 3 sheets.

title: Case 27
description: Minutes of meetings of vocal Jews of city councils of the Volyn province and commissions for elections to Jewish public councils, correspondence with them about the allocation of funds for holding elections, sending commission records, 14.11.1917-12.08.1918, 135 sheets.

title: Case 28
description: Minutes of meetings of commissions for elections to Jewish communities, their cost estimates and correspondence with city authorities on the distribution of the "box" fee between these commissions for holding elections, 11/18/1917-11/07/1918, 62 sheets.

title: Case 29
description: Minutes of the meetings of the Lozovsky city administration and the commission for elections to the Jewish community council with the city administrations of the Katerynoslav province on subsidizing, sending the paperwork of election commissions, 11/23/1917-08/28/1918, 15 sheets.

title: Case 30
description: Extracts from the minutes of the meeting and acts of the Katerynoslav Jewish Community Council, 06/10/1918-08/01/1918, 8 sheets.

title: Case 31
description: Minutes of meetings of commissions for elections to the Jewish community, their cost estimates and correspondence with the city administrations of the Kyiv province on subsidizing these commissions for conducting elections, 03.11.1917-16.07.1918, 138 sheets.

title: Case 32
description: Journals of the meetings of the Volyn and Podilsk provincial governments, the Starokonstantyniv City Duma, correspondence with the Ministry of Internal Affairs and the city administrations of the Kyiv province on the organization of elections to Jewish communities and the provision of funds for elections, etc., 10/24/1917-07/09/1918, 33 sheets.

title: Case 33
description: Minutes of meetings of vocal Jews of city councils and commissions for elections to Jewish public councils of cities of the Podilsk province, correspondence with them about the holding of elections and sending commission records, lists of candidates from Jewish party committees, etc., 03.11.1917-28.08.1918, 122 sheets.

title: Case 34
description: Journals of meetings of the Podilsk gubernatorial board, correspondence with the city and district administrations of the Podilsk gubernia about the transfer of the remaining "box" collection to the commissions for elections to Jewish communities, 07.11.1917-15.07.1918, 58 sheets.

title: Case 35
description: Minutes of meetings of vocal Jews of city councils with representatives of Jewish parties and meetings of commissions for elections to the Jewish community in the cities of Poltava province, correspondence with them about sending election materials; lists of candidates for the Kobelyak Jewish community and statements of Romna voters about violations of election rules in commissions, 13.01.1918-11.08.1918, 29 sheets.

title: Case 36
description: Minutes of meetings of commissions for elections to Jewish communities, prominent Jews; correspondence with city authorities on holding elections and providing funds, 12.01.1918-28.07.1918, 44 sheets.

title: Case 37
description: Minutes of meetings of vocal Jews of city councils, meetings of commissions for elections to Jewish communities and correspondence with them about holding elections, 10/12/1917-07/07/1918, 26 sheets.

description: Minutes of meetings, cost estimates, and statements of the Bobrovytska, Nikolsk-Slobidsk election commissions, and the Glukhiv Jewish Community Council on providing funds for holding elections to Jewish communities, 04/08/1918-07/09/1918, 11 sheets.

title: Case 39
description: Copies of the reports of the organizational and technical commission on conducting elections to Jewish communities and the order of the Ministry of Jewish Affairs on the allocation of funds, 05/28/1918-07/10/1918, 25 sheets.

title: Case 40
description: Report of the election commission to the Kharkiv Public Council on record keeping and correspondence with the city administration on the provision of election materials, 07.12.1917-27.06.1918, 6 sheets.

title: Case 41
description: Correspondence with the General Secretariat of Military Affairs of the Ukrainian SSR, the Council of Ministers of the UD, the Ministry of Internal Affairs, and city administrations on the organization of elections to Jewish communities, 12/18/1917-08/08/1918, 35 sheets.

title: Case 42
description: Correspondence with departments on the preparation of work reports, with the Malynyv organization of the Bund and the council of the Sumy Jewish community on the reorganization of Jewish communities, 03/21/1918-07/21/1918, 12 sheets.

title: Case 43
description: Correspondence with the city administrations of the Volyn province about subsidizing commissions for organizing elections to Jewish public councils for holding elections, October 14, 1917-July 14, 1918, 50 sheets.

title: Case 44
description: Correspondence with the city administrations of the Volyn province and commissions for organizing elections to Jewish public councils on the allocation of funds for holding elections and the provision of election commission materials, 12.27.1917-11.07.1918, 185 sheets.

title: Case 45
description: Correspondence with the Ministry of Finance of the UD on the provision of funds to employees and the State Bank on the transfer of funds to the account of the Ministry in connection with the liquidation of national ministries, 03/25/1918-09/02/1918, 11 sheets.

title: Case 46
description: Correspondence with the Volyn provincial administration and district elders on the elimination of obstacles in the organization of elections to Jewish communities, etc., 05/02/1918-07/03/1918, 8 sheets.

title: Case 47
description: Correspondence with the Jewish community councils of Volhynia about the distribution of funds from the "box" collection, the transfer of metric books from the rabbinate to Jewish communities, 07/07/1918, 13 sheets.

description: Correspondence with the Katerynoslav provincial commissar and the board, the Pavlograd city board on the provision of cost estimates, information on the state of funds in the coffers of Jewish colonies and the organization of Jewish communities, 11/26/1917-06/25/1918, 8 sheets.

title: Case 49
description: Correspondence with district elders of the Katerynoslav province about elections to Jewish communities, etc., 05/15/1918-07/30/1918, 3 sheets.

title: Case 50
description: Correspondence with city administrations and commissions on the organization of elections to Jewish public councils in the Katerynoslav province and the allocation of funds for holding elections, etc., 11/23/1917-07/18/1918, 46 sheets.

description: Correspondence with the city administrations of the Katerynoslav province on the state of the sums of the box tax and estimates of expenses of the election commissions for elections to Jewish communities, 12/27/1917-06/07/1918, 20 sheets.
